exm.mng: to stagger, to stumble, to reel, Taiwan pr. [lie4 ju1]
to advance with difficulty, to hesitate to advance
hesitant and not daring to move forward (idiom)
faltering steps, mumbling speech (idiom); hesitant, cringing, to cower
faltering steps, mumbling speech, hesitant, cringing, to cower
to trip, to miss a step, to slip
